Are being adjudicated in different legal systems (i.e. the legacy and AMA systems)
Originate from different Administrations (i.e. VBA and VHA)
Involve hearings held by different judges in legacy appeals
Include a motion for CUE with respect to a prior Board decision
Include a motion for reconsideration of a prior Board decision
Should be addressed in separate decisions pursuant to 11.7.2, to include issues dependent on completely different law and facts, etc.
Involve different representatives for different issues
Involve AMA appeals requesting review under different appeal lanes
